import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, Carousel, Accordion, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function HomePage() { useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => { entries.forEach(entry => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { entry.target.classList.add('visible'); } }); }); const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.scroll-fade-in'); elements.forEach(el => observer.observe(el)); }, []); return ( <> {/* Hero Section - Bold Icons with Pulse Animation */}

Create, Share, and Analyze Exams with ExamiVana

The easiest way to build professional online exams. Trusted by educators worldwide.

Powerful Features for Seamless Exams

Easy Exam Creation

Instant Analytics

Get detailed reports and insights on student performance.

Auto-Grading

Automatic scoring with remarks for quick feedback.

Integrated Chat

Communicate with students during exams for support.

Mobile Friendly

Take exams on any device with responsive design.

View Results

Auto-grade and analyze performance instantly.
